      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int backoffExponentialMillis
      Wait this long times 2^(number of consecutive errors so far) before retrying.

      Wait this long after every error before retrying.

      Wait this long times the number of consecutive errors so far before retrying.

      Maximum duration of moratorium to honor.

      Minimum duration after success to wait before allowing another trigger.
      long periodicIntervalMillis
      Automatically trigger this long after the last success.

    • Field Detail

      • backoffFixedMillis

        public long backoffFixedMillis
        Wait this long after every error before retrying.

      • backoffIncrementalMillis

        public long backoffIncrementalMillis
        Wait this long times the number of consecutive errors so far before retrying.

      • backoffExponentialMillis

        public int backoffExponentialMillis
        Wait this long times 2^(number of consecutive errors so far) before retrying.

      • maxMoratoriumMillis

        public long maxMoratoriumMillis
        Maximum duration of moratorium to honor. Mostly an issue for clock rollbacks.

      • minTriggerMillis

        public long minTriggerMillis
        Minimum duration after success to wait before allowing another trigger.

      • periodicIntervalMillis

        public long periodicIntervalMillis
        Automatically trigger this long after the last success.

    • Method Detail

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Description copied from class: java.lang.Object
        Returns a string containing a concise, human-readable description of this object. Subclasses are encouraged to override this method and provide an implementation that takes into account the object's type and data. The default implementation is equivalent to the following expression: 
           getClass().getName() + '@' + Integer.toHexString(hashCode())

        See Writing a useful toString method if you intend implementing your own toString method.

        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        a printable representation of this object.
